experiences.title: Data Analyst,
experiences.location: J.D. Irving, Saint John, New Brunswick
description: Designed and developed 10+ interactive Power BI reports, enabling Woodlands business users to make data-driven decisions and improve financial planning.
Optimized data sources, validated data integrity, and enhanced Alteryx workflows for efficient data processing.
Led the migration of reports from Tableau to Power BI, improving user experience and data accessibility.
Reduced reporting errors by 15% by identifying and resolving data inconsistencies and improving ETL processes.

Skills - Microsoft Power BI, Alteryx, Data Analysis, Tableau, SQL, Extract, Transform, Load (ETL), Microsoft SQL Server

Analyzed risks and recommended innovative solutions, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities.
